sentences.sContent: They rummage through piles of secondhand clothes for something that fits.
sentences.sCn: 他们在成堆的二手衣服中翻找合身的衣服。

synos.tran: 检查；搜出；仔细搜查；翻找出
翻找；检查；查出的物件；零星杂物

trans.tranCn: 检查；搜出；仔细搜查；翻找出
trans.tranOther: to search for something by moving things around in a careless or hurried way

trans.tranCn: 翻找；检查；查出的物件；零星杂物
trans.tranOther: a careless or hurried search for something
